features: Bathroom Storage: Toilet Paper Stand fits anywhere of your house,small size 5.9"Wx 6.7"D x 30"H great for small spaces, cute cabinet with toilet paper roll extender holding toilet paper easily,it provides much storage space in tiny room.

Small Bathroom Storage:fits perfectly in your half bath,top shelf great for holding small plant stand,wipes,cell phone or décor,cute design with toilet paper spindle for toilet paper storage,Open shelf add storage space for items with high usage.

Multiuse Toilet Storage: this narrow bathroom cabinet also use as a narrow nightstand great for tiny bedroom, perfect small bedside table for small spaces;use as a corner plant stand,used as bathroom furniture fit prefectly beside the toilet&bathtub.

Material: made of pvc(Polyvinyl Chloride)material,not solid wood, without spray painted,can be waterproof,worked great in the small bathroom.Add extra storage space to your bantroom, great space saver in your house.

Easy Assemble:this bathroom corner storage,package includes an assembly instruction to following up the replacement.Note: props shown in images not included;check small size if fits you,please aim at each slot and press gently during assemble.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: JINXIAMU furniture products are designed following the philosophy of "Beautifully simple look & Practically serve well". We integrate production and sales,and emphasize the practicality and functionality of the product. Most cost-effective product options,but never lack of practical function and decorative purpose,are offered,make your every shopping mimute and every penny count.

Multifunctional Bathroom Storage Cabinet Slim Bathroom Storage Cabinet This toilet paper roll holder with slim shelf also can be used for toilet storage cabinet, fits well between the bathtub and wall, Polyvinyl Chloride material perfect for bathroom; use a body spray organizer perfect size for shampoos, body washes, works great in your bathroom small spaces. Toilet Paper Holder This bathroom storage cabinet top shelf can hold the tissues , bottom 2-tier design more space for storage, open the door, can hold 4 rolls of mega roll toilet paper, or a few bottles of bathroom accessories. Toilet Brush and Roll Holder Set This bathroom storage cabinet with X-frame design also can be used for toilet brush toilet paper holder, open the door and take away a removable shelf, that will hide your toilet brush inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There is very little storage space in this small bathroom. Before this unit, I had to put extra tp, kleenex, and my wax scents on top of the toilet back or on the floor. This is so lightweight (you could say cheap) and easy to assemble and fits absolutely perfectly in this tiny slot between the wall and the toilet. Everything I need fits on and in it! I have two oversized to rolls in it. You do have to slightly squish them to get them in, but I'm quite happy with how they work. Even though the material isn't real wood, it is sturdy and held firmly together with interlocking joints and 10 screws.I'd been searching for a year for something that would work in this space and this little unit is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product, easy assembly, and looks good for the price. My 9yr. Old assembled it by himself. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly and good value
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the more unique pieces of flat pack furniture I’ve built. Although it has screws to finalize when assembled, they are not needed as this piece fits together like a 3d puzzle that is actually kind of fun to assemble. The material is super light weight but still sturdy and I think it will handle moisture very well. Taking off one star as the edges are a little rough but not too bad. Overall, a good value and a good little piece. Kudos to whoever came up with the unique design assembly. I would buy more from this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but just right
reviews.reviewText: I needed a very small storage cabinet for my half bath. This works perfectly. It is very small but it holds a tissue box, clorox wipes, and a roll of toilet paper. I don't use it as a roller just storage. It's the only cabinet I was able to get that fit a very small area. It's surprisingly sturdy given it's size. Great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not functional
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, looks cute, but loading toilet paper and losing the start of the roll almost every use makes it tedious. And it is catchy unless you put a piece of cardboard in the bottom. I guess if you're using for tissues only it makes more sense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars U get what u pay 4
reviews.reviewText: With that being said, this cabinet is such a space saving addition 2 my bathroom. There's always that space between the toilet & the vanity & its a perfect fit. It's functional....2 a point. Remember I said u get what u pay 4 & it is functional but it's construction isn't what I expected. This whole thing only comes with 6 screws. As u can see in the pics it's held 2gether with slots & tabs. The door hinges is a pointed tab inserted in a hole. I have yet 2 establish what funky polymer this thing is made of. So, I can't speak 2 its sturdiness. But I think it will hold up 4 my needs holding tissue rolls, kleenex & a candle. Good value 4 the money, looks good, functional. A win-win here IMHO. I'll update later if the need arises.I also bought the wicker front cabinet 4 my other bathroom so I will copy & paste this review when asked 2 review it. So, yes, I would purchase it again & Yes, I would recommend it 2 others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size between wall and toilet
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to snap together. The bottom shelf doesn't hold large toilet paper rolls very well as it's too skinny but if you squeeze the roll slightly you can shove it in there. I can fit 2 comfortably standing up and one on its side. You have to do the same for the square tissue - once it's in there it's good and when you pull for a tissue it doesn't pull the rack down or wiggle. I'm happy with the purchase for what I needed it to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It's not wood.
reviews.reviewText: I don't know the material they used, but it feels like some kind of cheap foam. It's very easy to put together.
